title: Sound On: Budget Uncertainty, Trump GOP Fissure
itunes:title: Sound On: Budget Uncertainty, Trump GOP Fissure
description:
Guests: Congressman Brendan Boyle of Pennsylvania, Marc Goldwein, Senior Vice President and Senior Policy Advisor at the Committee for a Responsible Budget, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
